我的FIREFOX扩展插件列表

Posted on 2008-12-11 | In 闲话
  • Add to Search Bar 1.7 - Add any search on any page to the Search Bar.
  • aliedit 1.1.0.2 - Alipay Security Control.
  • All-in-One Gestures 0.19.1 - This extension allows you to execute common commands using mouse gestures, rocker navigation, scroll wheel navigation and page scrolling.
  • Boss Key 0.1.8 - 为 Firefox、Thunderbird 增加“老板键”、最小化/关闭 到系统托盘和自动清理内存功能。
  • Compact Menu 2 2.2.0 - Duplicates the menubar on the toolbar as a menu of menus.
  • Download Statusbar 0.9.6.3 - 在一个整齐的下载状态栏中查看和管理你的下载内容
  • DownThemAll! 1.0.4 - Firefox的批量下载工具。
  • Easy DragToGo 1.1.2.2 - 轻松使用拖曳手势打开标签页
  • FEBE 6.0.3 - FEBE - 备份您的 Firefox 数据
  • FlashGot 1.1.5 - 允许调用外部下载管理器处理单个或批量下载任务.(您可以通过访问作者主页了解更多细节)
  • FoxClocks 2.4.97 - 在应用程序的状态栏/工具栏显示世界多个地域的时间。支持调用 Google Earth
  • Foxmarks Bookmark Synchronizer 2.6.0 - 在多台机器之间同步您的书签
  • Free Download Manager plugin 1.3.4 - Free Download Manager integration with Firefox browser.
  • Glazoom (formerly known as Zoom It!) 0.24 - Zooms to make your desired section of a page fit into the viewport
  • Gmail Manager 0.5.5 - Gmail 帐户管理与新邮件通知。
  • Google Calendar Notifier 2.5.3 - This extension provides robust notifications and display of your Google Calendars for today, as well as showing any upcoming all day events for tomorrow.
  • Google Reader Watcher 0.0.13.2 - Checks your Google Reader for unread feeds
  • Grab and Drag 2.7.4 - 增加像 Adobe Acrobat 一样的手形工具, 通过拖拽滚动网页.
  • Greasemonkey 0.8.20080609.0 - 面向 Firefox 的用户脚本管理器
  • gTranslate 0.5.1 - Translates the selected text via Google Translate.
  • IE Tab 1.5.20081203 - 让 Firefox 也能内嵌 IE 用双核心!!!
  • ImageBot 4.0.3 - An Image Uploader
  • Locationbar² 1.0.3 - Formats and linkifies addresses in your Location bar.
  • Menu Editor 1.2.6 - Customize application menus
  • MR Tech Toolkit 6.0.3.1 - 便于本地安装扩展和主题的强大工具包 (zh-CN)
  • Nightly Tester Tools 2.0.2 - Useful tools for the nightly er.
  • Open Addons 1.1.2 - 仅点击一下就能打开“附加组件”窗口。
  • OpenBook 2.0.1.1 - Allows for customization of the Add Bookmark dialog
  • Organize Status Bar 0.6.2 - 组织您自己的状态栏图标。
  • ScrapBook 1.3.3.9 - 帮助您保存和整理收藏的网页资料。
  • ScribeFire 3.1.5 - 一个全功能的博客编辑器, 整合于您的浏览器之中并使您很简便的发布博客。
  • Search Marker 1.0.5 - Highlight function marks the location of search results.
  • Sidebar on Right 0.3 - Moves sidebar to the right side of the browser.
  • Stealther 1.0.6 - Surf the web without leaving a trace in Firefox.
  • Stylish 0.5.8 - 自定义网站和用户界面的外观样式。
  • Tab Mix Plus 0.3.6.1.080406 - 加强标签页浏览功能。
  • TagSifter 4.1.4 - Browse your bookmarks with sets of tags
  • Textarea Cache 0.5.2 - 自動備份文字輸入區
  • TimerFox 0.6 - Easily counts down from a predefined number and alarms you when the count has reached zero.
  • Todoist Post 0.77 - Posts items to your projects on Todoist.com.
  • Todoist.com Sidebar 1.1 - Get quick access to Todoist.com from your browser sidebar
  • Undo Closed Tabs Button 3.0.3
  • 在工具栏添加一个用于还原已关闭标签页的按钮;
  • 比比猫视频下载器 0.8.3 - 帮您从如土豆、优酷等各大网站下载视频
  • Chromifox 1.0 - A coat of Chrome for Firefox.

Theme

  • Default
  • iFox Smooth 3.0.3 - Smooth blended version of iFox
  • Adobe Acrobat - Adobe PDF Plug-In For Firefox and Netscape
  • Alipay security control - npaliedit
  • IE Tab Plug-in - IE Tab Plug-in for Mozilla/Firefox
  • iTunes Application Detector - iTunes Detector Plug-in
  • Java Plug-in - Java Plug-in 1.4.2_05 for Netscape Navigator (DLL Helper)
  • Microsoft? DRM - DRM Netscape Network Object
  • Microsoft? Windows Media Player Firefox Plugin - np-mswmp
  • Mozilla Default Plug-in - Default Plug-in
  • QuickTime Plug-in 7.5.5 - The QuickTime Plugin allows you to view a wide variety of multimedia content in Web pages. For more information, visit the QuickTime Web site.
  • Shockwave Flash - Shockwave Flash 10.0 r12
  • Shockwave for Director - Adobe Shockwave for Director Netscape plug-in, version 11.0
  • Windows Media Player Plug-in Dynamic Link Library - Npdsplay dll
